# Brilliant Emanation (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[Sanctified Spells|Sanctified 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** Sacrifice

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 100-ft.-radius emanation + 10-ft. radius per level

**Duration:** 1d4 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 92

This spell causes a divine glow to radiate from any reflective objects worn or carried by the caster, including metal armor. Evil creatures within the spell’s area are [[Blinded|blinded]] unless they succeed on a Fortitude saving throw. Nonevil characters perceive the brilliant light emanating from the caster, but are not [[Blinded|blinded]] by it and do not suffer any negative effects from it. Evil characters that make their saving throw are not [[Blinded|blinded]], but are distracted, taking a –1 penalty on any attacks made within the spell’s area for the duration of the spell. Creatures must be able to see visible light to be affected by this spell.

*Sacrifice:* 1d3 points of Strength damage.
